title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Instructional Design and Social Context: Power Structures through Text Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Curriculum Design Concepts and Experience with Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate power dynamics in instructional design processes through text analysis.
Learners can identify cultural biases in educational materials and propose alternative design solutions.
Learners can argue how algorithm-driven instructional design may reproduce social inequalities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
